title: If Draven buys Ravenous Hydra, make it automatically rename to "Dravenous Hydra"

replies.body: Why would he buy something that doesn't even work on him ?
"Why a nashors tooth in Draven? Because Draven" - Primetime

ok now rito knows what to do next april' s fools
its worth the 4 reports
Would be worth the passive.

It gives 75 AD and 100% base health regen. It's just a question of whether you value more survivability when you can't auto (getting poked out, hard CC) or more in combat stats (BT has slightly more AD and lifesteal).

{{champion:119}} :  I want to make the crowd doubt me then cheer when I make it work. I love the attention.

_" 10 seconds of silence"_

{{champion:119}} : ...Draaaavveeennn.
You do realize it's there for the troll and no one will ever take it seriously.
I disagree, I've run this item on Draven on dominion, as other options were shit!
BT is not available in every map, making Dravenous Hydraven absolutely viable on certain maps !
All it needs is a D
Just like your mom!
I knew this was just gonna be comments about why not to buy it. We know people. Its still funny
